content.json: # Azure ARC Enabled SQL Server Best Practice Assessment

## Log Analytics Workspace
### To review Best Practice Assessments you will need to point to the correct Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: ResourceGroupLA
parameters.label: LA Resource Group
parameters.query:
resourceContainers 
| where type == "microsoft.resources/subscriptions/resourcegroups"
| join kind = inner (
    resources
    | where type == "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"
    | distinct resourceGroup, subscriptionId
) on resourceGroup, subscriptionId
| project resourceGroup
| order by resourceGroup asc

parameters.name: LogAnalytics
parameters.label: Log Analytics Workspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where tolower(type) == "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroupLA})
| project AffectedResource=id, resourceGroup

content.json: ## ARC SQL Best Practice Assessment Results

parameters.name: ResourceGroup
parameters.label: Resource Group
parameters.query:
resourceContainers 
| where type == "microsoft.resources/subscriptions/resourcegroups"
| join kind = inner (
    resources
    | where tolower(type) == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
    | distinct resourceGroup, subscriptionId
) on resourceGroup, subscriptionId
| project resourceGroup
| order by resourceGroup asc

parameters.name: Server
parameters.label: ARC Enabled Server
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| project machineId = tolower(tostring(id)), Server = name
| join kind = inner (
    resources
    | where type =~ "microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances"
    | extend machineId = tolower(tostring(properties.containerResourceId))
    | project machineId, name
) on machineId
| distinct machineId, Server

parameters.name: SQLServer
parameters.label: SQL Server
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where tolower(tostring(id)) in ({Server})
| parse id with * 'machines/' Server
| where Server contains "{ServerSearch}"
| project machineId = tolower(tostring(id))
| join kind = inner (
    resources
    | where type =~ "microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances"
    | extend machineId = tolower(tostring(properties.containerResourceId))
    | project SqlId = tolower(tostring(id)), machineId, name
) on machineId
| project SqlId, SQLServer = name

content.query:
let machineCSV = ("{Server}");
print machineCSV
| project machineArray = parse_csv(machineCSV)
| mv-expand machineId = machineArray
| project machineId = replace_string(tostring(machineId), "'", "")
| parse machineId with * 'machines/' Server
| where Server like "{ServerSearch}"
| join kind = inner (
    SqlAssessment_CL
    | extend machineId = tolower(_ResourceId)
    | extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
    | where asmt[6] == "1"
    | distinct machineId, SqlInstance = tostring(asmt[7])
) on machineId
| summarize InstancesAssessed = count() by machineId, Server
content.title: ARC Enabled Servers

content.query:
let sqlCSV = ("{SQLServer}");
print sqlCSV
| project sqlArray = parse_csv(sqlCSV)
| mv-expand sqlId = sqlArray
| project sqlId = replace_string(tostring(sqlId), "'", "")
| where "{machineId}" != "None" 
| parse sqlId with * 'sqlserverinstances/' SQLServer
| parse "{machineId}" with * 'machines/' Server
| where SQLServer startswith Server
| join kind = leftouter (
    SqlAssessment_CL
    | extend machineId = tolower(_ResourceId)
    | where machineId == "{machineId}"
    | extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
    | where asmt[6] == "1"
    | project SQLServer = replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])), "\\", "_"), upload_id = tostring(asmt[1]), format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')
) on SQLServer
| summarize TimeGenerated = min(TimeGenerated) by sqlId, SQLServer, upload_id
| summarize EarliestAssessment = min(TimeGenerated), LatestAssessment = max(TimeGenerated) by sqlId, SQLServer
| project
    sqlId, SQLServer, EarliestAssessment, LatestAssessment, MigrationAssessment = strcat("https://portal.azure.com/#view/Microsoft_Azure_HybridData_Platform/Assessment.ReactView/instanceName/", SQLServer)
content.title: ARC Enabled SQL Server Instances

parameters.name: AssessmentDate
parameters.label: Assessment Date
parameters.query:
SqlAssessment_CL
| where tolower(_ResourceId) == "{machineId}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where asmt[6] =~ "1"
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") == "{sqlName}"
| project upload_id = tostring(asmt[1]),format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')
| summarize TimeGenerated = min(TimeGenerated) by upload_id
| order by TimeGenerated

SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineId}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlName}"
| where tostring(asmt[1]) == "{AssessmentDate}"
| extend CheckId=tostring(asmt[2])
| project CheckId
| join kind = innerunique Rules on $left.CheckId == $right.ID
| distinct Category
| order by Category asc

parameters.name: Target
parameters.query:
SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineId}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlName}"
| where tostring(asmt[1]) == "{AssessmentDate}"
| extend Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed")
| extend Target=tostring(asmt[7])
| distinct TargetSearch = replace_string(replace_string(Target, "\\", "_"), ":", ""), Target

parameters.name: Severity
parameters.query:
SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineId}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlName}"
| where tostring(asmt[1]) == "{AssessmentDate}"
| extend Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed")
| extend SeverityCode = toint(asmt[8])
| distinct Severity, SeverityCode
| order by SeverityCode
| project-away SeverityCode

parameters.name: Alert
parameters.query:
SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineId}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlName}"
| where tostring(asmt[1]) == "{AssessmentDate}"
| extend Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed")
| extend CheckId=tostring(asmt[2])
| distinct CheckId
| order by CheckId asc

SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineId}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlName}"
| where tostring(asmt[1]) == "{AssessmentDate}"
| extend
    AsmtId=tostring(asmt[1]),
    CheckId=tostring(asmt[2]),
    DisplayString=asmt[3],
    Description=tostring(asmt[4]),
    HelpLink=asmt[5],
    TargetType=case(asmt[6] == 1, "Server", asmt[6] == 2, "Database", ""),
    TargetName=tostring(asmt[7]), 
    Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed"),
    Message=tostring(asmt[9]),
    TagsArr=split(tostring(asmt[10]), ","),
    Sev = toint(asmt[8])
| where AsmtId == "{AssessmentDate}"
| join kind = innerunique Rules on $left.CheckId == $right.ID
| where Category in ({Category})
| where replace_string(replace_string(TargetName, "\\", "_"), ":", "") in ({Target})
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| where CheckId in ({Alert})
| project
    TargetType,
    TargetName,
    Severity,
    Message,
    Tags=strcat_array(array_slice(TagsArr, 1, -1), ', '),
    CheckId,
    Category,
    Description,
    HelpLink = tostring(HelpLink),
    SeverityCode = toint(Sev)
| summarize Issues = count() by Severity, SeverityCode, Tags, CheckId, Category
| summarize count() by Severity
| render piechart
content.title: Alerts by Severity

SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineId}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlName}"
| where tostring(asmt[1]) == "{AssessmentDate}"
| extend
    AsmtId=tostring(asmt[1]),
    CheckId=tostring(asmt[2]),
    DisplayString=asmt[3],
    Description=tostring(asmt[4]),
    HelpLink=asmt[5],
    TargetType=case(asmt[6] == 1, "Server", asmt[6] == 2, "Database", ""),
    TargetName=tostring(asmt[7]), 
    Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed"),
    Message=tostring(asmt[9]),
    TagsArr=split(tostring(asmt[10]), ","),
    SeverityCode = toint(asmt[8])
| where AsmtId == "{AssessmentDate}"
| join kind = innerunique Rules on $left.CheckId == $right.ID
| where Category in ({Category})
| where Severity != "Passed"
| project
    TargetType,
    TargetName,
    Severity,
    Message,
    Tags=strcat_array(array_slice(TagsArr, 1, -1), ', '),
    CheckId,
    Category,
    CategoryDescription,
    CategoryhelpLink,
    HelpLink = tostring(HelpLink),
    SeverityCode
| where replace_string(replace_string(TargetName, "\\", "_"), ":", "") in ({Target})
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| where CheckId in ({Alert})
| summarize Issues = count() by Alert = CheckId, Severity, SeverityCode, AlertCategory = Category, CategoryDescription, HelpLink = CategoryhelpLink
| project Alert, Severity, SeverityCode, AlertCategory, Issues, CategoryDescription, HelpLink
| order by SeverityCode, Issues
| project-away SeverityCode

SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId =~ "{machineId}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlName}"
| extend
    AsmtId=tostring(asmt[1]),
    CheckId=tostring(asmt[2]),
    DisplayString=asmt[3],
    Description=tostring(asmt[4]),
    HelpLink=asmt[5],
    TargetType=case(asmt[6] == 1, "Server", asmt[6] == 2, "Database", ""),
    TargetName=tostring(asmt[7]), 
    Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed"),
    Message=tostring(asmt[9]),
    TagsArr=split(tostring(asmt[10]), ","),
    Sev = toint(asmt[8])
| where AsmtId == "{AssessmentDate}"
| join kind = innerunique Rules on $left.CheckId == $right.ID
| extend Tags=strcat_array(array_slice(TagsArr, 1, -1), ', ')
| where Category in ({Category})
| where Severity != "Passed"
| where replace_string(replace_string(TargetName, "\\", "_"), ":", "") in ({Target})
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| where CheckId in ({Alert})
| where "{selAlert}" == "All" or CheckId == "{selAlert}"
| summarize count() by Category
| render piechart
content.title: Recommendations by Category

SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineId}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlName}"
| extend
    AsmtId=tostring(asmt[1]),
    CheckId=tostring(asmt[2]),
    DisplayString=asmt[3],
    Description=tostring(asmt[4]),
    HelpLink=asmt[5],
    TargetType=case(asmt[6] == 1, "Server", asmt[6] == 2, "Database", ""),
    TargetName=tostring(asmt[7]), 
    Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed"),
    Message=tostring(asmt[9]),
    TagsArr=split(tostring(asmt[10]), ","),
    Sev = toint(asmt[8])
| where AsmtId == "{AssessmentDate}"
| join kind = innerunique Rules on $left.CheckId == $right.ID
| where Category in ({Category})
| where Severity != "Passed"
| where replace_string(replace_string(TargetName, "\\", "_"), ":", "") in ({Target})
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| where CheckId in ({Alert})
| where "{selAlert}" == "All" or CheckId == "{selAlert}"
| project
    Target = TargetType,
    Name = TargetName,
    Severity,
    Message,
    Tags=strcat_array(array_slice(TagsArr, 1, -1), ', '),
    Alert = CheckId,
    Description,
    HelpLink = tostring(HelpLink),
    SeverityCode = toint(Sev)
| order by SeverityCode desc, Target desc, Name asc
| project-away SeverityCode
